description.lang: This device is a multiple functions button switch. It is able toswitch the appliances on/off or adjust the percentage of dimmer.It can also work as a timer. The well designed wall bracket andmagnetic back let the switch can be fixed on the wall. This productcan be included and operated in any Z-Wavenetworkwith other Z-Wavecertified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications.
